Description: OVERVIEWExperience a throwback guitar infused with modern reliability.The perfect guitar for the player who is looking for authentic Gibson tones, with the best of what modern craftsmanship has to offer. The traditional mahogany-maple tonewoods with HERRITAGE CHERRY RED finish and nickel hardware, accompanied by vintage-style keystone tuners, give this Les Paul Tribute a true vintage vibe. Its slim-taper neck profile, powerful modern humbucking pickups, and comfort-enhancing weight relief make it fit for today's most demanding players.
